website_summaries.verdict: This Ecos detergent has a pleasant odor, but isn't the best for heavily soiled loads.
pros: The magnolia and lily scent is quite nice
The twice-concentrated formula saves product, and the built-in fabric softener keeps clothes soft and durable
cons: Some complain that Ecos doesn't remove heavy stains and odors

customer_reviews.title: Honest review, here.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried Tide. I’ve tried Gain. I’ve tried All, Arm and Hammer, too. Ecos is my favorite, how about you? No, seriously. When the tide rolls in, what shall you gain? Clean clothes. But that’s not all. With a little arm and hammer, you could accomplish great things, but if you want to take the elbow work out, just choose Ecos. Disclaimer: Magnolia and Lily is my fav. I don’t walk around smelling like a flower, but rather a clean individual who indeed washes her clothes. As with lavender. You’re welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you want to stink
customer_reviews.text: Good grief this stuff is horrible! Since switching to this ALL our clothes stink!!! Ended up giving 4 of these away since I made the mistake of subscribing for it. Icky stuff. I’ve used plenty of other more natural soaps and this is by far the worst!
customer_reviews.author: meggieschill

customer_reviews.title: Pulls color from some clothes while still feeling a little rough!
customer_reviews.text: Not great. Smells nice but doesn’t clean that well. Somehow still fades the colors more than other detergents. We will donate the rest. I love the eco friendly style but it needs to work.
customer_reviews.author: Alec_P

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitivity, but not the best at cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap, and it doesn't give me the allergic reaction I was getting from another detergent, but it also doesn't clean as well. Sometimes, my socks still have a hint of odor from before, and they come out smelling like water (if it even has a smell!). (wait, there is no way water has a smell because scent is picked up by chemoreceptors in the nose, which would need a non-basic molecule to be able to detect it). I digress. My clothes come out of the wash smelling like nothing most of the time, but I will probably switch detergents once I use this one up.
customer_reviews.author: MagicMom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in lavender so I used my same review I left for that, however I like the scent of this one more than the lavender! I love this detergent. I bought for the sensitive skin my kids have and because it's more "eco friendly" for the septic tank. It gets the clothes clean and I do not use softener in the wash but this actually has a softner incorporated in the mix and seems to work! This is a concentrate so you don't have to use as much as you think, and it doesn't have an overpowering scent after it's washed. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Shame on you ECOS. You are no longer trusted.
customer_reviews.text: If you like the smell of standing in a Yankee candle store than this soap is for you! Gross. I thought I could trust ECOS brand to be toxin free. How is a HIGHLY fragrant (more fragrant than Tide) be called "hypoallergenic? This has at least 4x the fragrance that even a person who likes TO USE AND INHALE TOXIC CHEMICALS could possibly need. Shame on me for not reading the fine print. Shame on ECOS for tricking us into believing that you cared about our health, and were are clean, green and trusted company.
customer_reviews.author: Crowlover

customer_reviews.title: Works great and fresh scent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light scent. Just smells fresh and clean. Not flowery as the name implies. I am allergic to a lot of scents and products but not this one. I also use this for my senior dogs laundry and it gets her soiled “accident” stained blankets fresh and spotless like nothing else I have tried. Target stopped selling this so I was happy to find it on amazon. Great value for the money. Do the math and see!
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl92

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and scent didn't irritate my skin!!
customer_reviews.text: I always love this brand's laundry soap but wanted to try a scent... reluctantly. However: It doesn't irritate my skin at all! Nor is it overpowering once the clothes are dry. Barely noticeable unless you basically inhale your shirt. As always I'll buy Earth Friendly ECOs again and again. I feel that you can use like 40% less than what's listed, so lasts longer than the other biodegradable organically blah blah laundry soaps out there. The scent isn't my favorite and I'd like to try a different one or just do unscented again. It's a little girly and I typically like lemon, ginger, etc. It is in NO way floral-perfumey smelling or anything so don't worry about that.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Favorite detergent.
customer_reviews.text: We've used this brand for 10 years. Out laundry is clean and fresh. It is safe to use on silk, and tough to clean up your laundry. For very tough stains and soil, I pre-treat the dirty areas, pre-wash and then toss it in the laundry. Great for regular washing machines and HE as well. Be sure to follow instructions for HE machines because you require a smaller amount of detergent for those loads.
customer_reviews.author: C T

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand of detergent for almost seven years now and noticed right away that the consistency was off. These were definitely watered down, not cool
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Welch

customer_reviews.title: 140 loads less
customer_reviews.text: Used this for years...USED to be a great deal! The bottles used to be 170 load bottles. Now they are 100 loads. So we are now 140 loads short FOR SAME PRICE. Why not lower the price??
customer_reviews.author: Genna

customer_reviews.title: Happy me
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if I was going to like the fragrance or how strong it would be. When I tried this detergent the smell is not strong at all. I do not see where it says the fragrance on the container was not sure if I received the right product. My husband and daughter have sensitive reactions to most detergents. They have not had a problem, and the clothes come out so soft. The fact that it is concentrated is great saves money. I have used other detergents and they were not really concentrated when I went to use them but very little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about product
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure if it is even cleaning the clothes. Smell is nice going in washer but clothes have no scent coming out and some things still have dirt or food on them after washing. First time trying this brand so we will see if it’s just what I’m washing or actual detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Wabih

customer_reviews.title: Laundry Detergant
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product right now. I'm not allergic to it. Smells good, and does as good as than Gain which I been using more than 20 years. Not much smell and to many suds. But cleans good so far. I havent used on extremely dirty clothes. Im going to keep ordering this product as long as they don't change the chemicals. E cept suds are just usless really. I can make my own laundry soap if I need to. Bubbles arent necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Tegina Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, but no match for tough stains
customer_reviews.text: Ecos Detergent smells amazing out of the bottle! However, the lovely scent does not stay with the clean laundry. Also, it doesn’t get out those tough toddler stains very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I've had to rewash clothes because they just aren't clean. The scent is hardly noticeable when you open the bottle and once in the washer this detergent can leave a bitter smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Healthy ingredients, not good for stains
customer_reviews.text: I buy these because I have chronic UTI's and infections. I also have an intolerance to chemicals. After doing a lot of research on detergent ingredients, I found this to less harmful as many others. However, this product isn't very good for getting any stains out of clothes. Will definitely need to pretreat any stains- even ones which usually wash right out.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Good for the earth, good price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a year now and love it! It's gone down in price too! I feel good using a soap that it more environmentally friendly and not laden with all sorts of chemicals (that end up on your skin). It has a pleasant scent. You get a lot of detergent for your money. It's my new Go-to soap brand because it's good quality and fits my budget. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. So far I’ve tried the magnolia & Lily and lavender scents, and they work nicely on my laundry. My only complaint is about delivery. Both bottles were leaking, and it seems the sealed protection caps were broken when I open the box. I hope this is not a recurrent problem. Otherwise nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana AH

customer_reviews.title: LEAKED OUT
customer_reviews.text: This is the only detergent I use. Beautiful clean settle scent. I bought this online because I am too busy to run extra errands this week. I opened the box and it totally leaked out from both bottles!!! I lost about 3-4 medium loads each. That's ALOT. Im annoyed because I'm doing laundry for my elderly parents in addition to my own. Now I'll have to buy more sooner than later. Do NOT this online. I'll have to continue buying it at the store instead. I'm annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne7

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product that cleans very well. The only possible issue is that the scent stayed with the clothes a good while after washing. That can, however, be a plus for many people. It is not an offensive odor and it a clean scent. It just took me aback a little because I was not expecting it. Often products that are "natural" like this have a very vague scent. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: cattails

customer_reviews.title: OK for lightly soiled items
customer_reviews.text: I live in a home where my washer dumps into a greywater tank that waters my garden, so I cannot use detergents with salts and etc. This detergent does the job, but if an item is soiled, like a white kitchen towel, it doesn't release the stains. I will have to do a supplemental trip to the laundromat to bleach my whites. I wish it had a little more stain-fighting power.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Best family detergent
customer_reviews.text: As a wife and a mother I have to make sure to keep my family safe by using safe products. I have cut back a lot of chemicals in my household and now only buy and use chemical free products. Love that it has a gentle smell and I don’t have to worry about harsh chemicals when I do laundry 🧺 highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah

customer_reviews.title: Decent detergent for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is a HE detergent and you shouldn’t use it a lot. Otherwise you will have a stale smell after wash. If you have contemporary washer you will also need additional rinse cycle or deep rinse whichever do you have. And if you do everything right you will have clean clothes with a very light fresh smell. One minus is packaging! It seems like the cap was not closed tight and my two bottles was all covered in detergent. I see a lot of people complain about it and is actually true.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Parker

customer_reviews.title: Product was spilled all over the two boxes it was in
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. I am only complaining because they shipped it on its side in a bigger box and it spilled all over the box it was in and the bigger one that had other items in it. Not too happy about that. I give 5 stars for the product itself but only 2 for the shipping on its side.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Smells like the laundromat, NOTHING like magnolias or lilies or anything even near floral
customer_reviews.text: Literally smells like the laundromat, absolutely NOTHING like magnolias or lilies or even anything near floral at all. Very disappointed in the scent and returned due to this. Seriously smelled like flat bar soap.
customer_reviews.author: Emmalyn J.

customer_reviews.title: no headline
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased this soap-it was love at first load not too fragrant very good at cleaning stains but best of all very little wrinkling of clothes use it on every load--kind to the clothes not too much suds -- I have very sensitive skin and i have no problem
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Cools

customer_reviews.title: NOT hypo-allergenic and really strong fragrance
customer_reviews.text: After washing, my laundry has a really strong synthetic fragrance and a sticky layer on it that I'm allergic to. I tried this brand's "Free", which is a lot better. The best, though, is Ecover Zero. Leaves no residue and smells like nothing! I'm a bit annoyed as I am a student and bought two of these and had to give them to a friend :/
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Detergent
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box there was detergent spilled everywhere. I won't be purchasing laundry detergent again through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kitson

customer_reviews.title: Great Eco-friendly Choice with Leaping Bunny Certificate
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) cleans well 2) no strong smells 3) leaping bunny certificate Cons: 1) have to use more than recommended to get the cleaning result
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good soap, Handle Cracked
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this soap for a while now. Had a two pack delivered today. Inside of the box was wet. Found the handle on one of the bottles is cracked and weeping a little soap. We will transfer to another bottle when there is room. This has now happened 3 times. Bottle cracked again. This is 4 times
customer_reviews.author: ironmke

customer_reviews.title: Like the product, poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great and I've really enjoyed the scent. Knocked off stars because one of the bottles came split open so the box was covered in detergent. I didn't want to toss out the bottle as it was still quite full, so I'm consistently wiping up a pool of detergent where the bottle sits in my laundry area.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the strong floral scent
customer_reviews.text: Laundry smells great. Got this to replace a 365 brand liquid detergent from the store. The 365 brand was watery and lacked sufficient scent to make laundry smell great. This product is thick, and fragrant out of the bottle. Clothes retain the scent out (when i put my nose up to them) of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Lightbearer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh, just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok, You have to use twice as much as they say for it to work(typical) and the scent doesn't last through the dryer. I still haven't found a natural detergent worth the price...I'll keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Julia G Johanan

customer_reviews.title: Clean laundry with a light and lovely scent!
customer_reviews.text: Our family has been using ECOS for a couple years and we have always been pleased. Everything from our clothes to the dog towels get clean, every time. The plant-based power has us hooked! And the Magnolia and Lily scent is by far our favorite! Reminds me of soaps our grandmother would use when cleaning. This is the laundry soap for us through and through!
customer_reviews.author: Dogmama

customer_reviews.title: One of the best detergents I have used
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered ECOS at my Costco and was happy to say the least at how well this detergent worked. Our clothes are clean, soft and the colors clear and bright and the whites are as white as can be. Imagine how much I loved to find it on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great natural detergent
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous to buy this because I usually buy scent free detergent due to sensitive skin. This is a very nice clean light scent and it does not linger. It has not bothered my skin at all. Will be sticking with this, seems to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Safe choice
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent of this laundry soap. Its fresh but not overpowering and good for sensitive skin its also rated with the safer products label which is number one on my list for something that is on my skin 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: Boopoopbdoop

customer_reviews.title: Awful scent. Leaves clothes smelling musty
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product first and foremost because it's cruelty free. I loved the fact that it has a built in fabric softener and so many reviews liked the scent so I was excited to try. I HATE the scent. It leaves my laundry with a musty smell. I first noticed it in my washcloths I kept thinking they were dirty but realized it was not the case when I got out a new one and immediately noticed the scent. I then did a load of clothes and same thing, YUK! Clothes "appear" clean but with the scent I'm not so sure about that! I will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Thorfinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product but packaging may cause some leakage
customer_reviews.text: The actual product is great (as I've used other scents of this brand). Packaging could be a bit better. The tops were smooshed in, so one of them leaked
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Good Laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this laundry detergent is friendly to my skin. Family likes it as well. And what makes it good this detergent is Eco friendly too. Plus such a sweet deal. Has a thick consistency so a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Different Formula...
customer_reviews.text: I love ECOS products, and I've been using this product for some time, but I think the formula has changed to more of a gel consistency. It still gets the job done, but I miss the old formula.
customer_reviews.author: Wyetha Lipford

customer_reviews.title: Very fragrant.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used ECOS laundry detergent for a while and I def don’t remember the scent of this kind being so strong. It was overwhelming and seemed unnatural. I am sensitive to smells so others might not find the smell offensive. Returned the item for the UltraConcentrate that comes in a pump bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller containers than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than expected. For the price and convenience you can do as well or better with the same version in a larger container that Costco sells. If you're having to drive a long way to shop than this is a decent option.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Visger

customer_reviews.title: Smells delish
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this simply because I wanted something environmentally friendly so I didn’t have super high expectations. Boy was I surprised. People have complimented me on the scent of my clothes (seems weird) and I know of at least 3 households that are now using this after I told them about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris B

customer_reviews.title: hypoallergenic with light natural scent!
customer_reviews.text: this is truly hypoallergenic with light natural scent! I have gone through several "hypoallergenic natural" laundry detergent with a fake chemical scent that kills my allergies! This is the first one i have found that i just love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and I am allergic to most chemicals, but this is perfect! it has no smell and no color but deodorizes completely. Also, hard stains like chocolate, ketchup or turmeric got clean easily by washing them in hot hater mode.
customer_reviews.author: Mahsa Esfand

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged and leaked out all over box.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged and leaked out all over box. Sorry, but this appears to be the only way I can tell you about this issue. If you correct the situation I will change my review, thank you! Barbara
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great for stains
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for babies and adults with sensitive skin. We switched to this brand when we had our baby and we won't go back! It does a great job cleaning and removing deep stains.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Nelson

customer_reviews.title: A great product for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: While I don't think this detergent gets out really dirty stains, it is a great detergent for ordinary laundry and smells wonderful. It didn't bother my sensitive skin, so I think that it rinses out well too. I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: islandgirl1056

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came in bigger containers. But i love this stuff, love the smell, and the price. Since i started using this detergent i don't like any other.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Acerno

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you don’t have to add softener. Sometimes I do just because I want a great scent on the clothes Works great, cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hankins

customer_reviews.title: LEAKED!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lillies are poisonous to Cats snd Dogs. This contains Lilly essential oil. Leaked in box. Lids were not on tight. This seems like a factory problem.
customer_reviews.author: LOVE SCOTTISH TERRIERS

customer_reviews.title: Decent detergent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several months now. It is gentle enough for all the skin types and clothes in our house. It does a nice job cleaning and has a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: sariann44

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t ever buy. Doesn’t get stains out like Tide or a real washing detergent and smells horrible. I gave it to the local animal shelter because I wouldn’t use this crap on my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Added arm and hammer laundry boost to it
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I took the reviews to heart and combined it with arm and hammer laundry boost and 2 bottles lasted me 4 months. Seems more hypoallergenic than other detergents
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Packing not good
customer_reviews.text: My order came today and had leaked in shopping. Not sure how much I lost, but too much hassle to return . Box was messy. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Teesa Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Great value and lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent on these is lovely but not overpowering. You only need a little per load so it is a good value. I already repurchased this item
customer_reviews.author: PeggyM

customer_reviews.title: Shipping may break bottle seal...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but one of the laundry detergents exploded in the shipping process and a large amount of the detergent seeped out of the package and onto the shipping box as you can see in the picture of the 2 detergents side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Good Price/Value for a Hard-Woking Detergent!
customer_reviews.text: I like this detergent a lot! It's concentrated, so a bottle last a long time. It leaves a nice scent on my clothes, and my laundry comes out clean every time!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela I. Bright

customer_reviews.title: cleaning with an earth friendly product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this detergent. The scent is not to strong and you don't use very much for a full load. I think the laundry is looking cleaner. Pretty hefty plastic containers, but have been using for awhile and no shipping leaks. For Christmas I'm giving a jug to each of my kids.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Leaked During Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Some of the content spilled during shipping. It was double-boxed but not fully cushioned to prevent leakage. I probably lost the equivalent of 15 washes. No point of asking for a replacement. The price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant clean soft laundry😊
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love the soft clean scent. Leaves clothes soft and clean. I bit pricey but I choose to continue purchase. If it's not broke, why fix it(:
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G

customer_reviews.title: Crack in the seem, only lost a little soap.
customer_reviews.text: Love the magnolia and Lily sent and order it regularly but this time the box was wet inside and I discovered the seem in one bottle was cracked at the base of handle. After I poured out most of it from above the base of the handle I squeeze the bottle and bubbles came out at the seem. Overall, I lost just a little of the soap.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use for different kinds of clothing. Very eco friendly, also. Will continue buying, and so we do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Montes

customer_reviews.title: Clean smell and look
customer_reviews.text: My husband and daughter have sensitive skin, sand this hasn’t effected them. Wevrything gets clean PLUS my husbands smelly work clothes n sock get clean.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Product Leaked
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and have ordered the detergent multiple times. The packaging was TERRIBLE-both containers leaked all over the box. One leaked out about a fourth of the container. Despite the packaging I will continue to recommend this laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: critterlover

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this laundry detergent. It smells good and is great for sensitive skin. My husband and I are both sensitive to chemicals and this does not irritate our skin at all. I highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Coburns

customer_reviews.title: great laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent, the suds and safe for my septic system. Cleans clothes really well.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Cuddington

customer_reviews.title: Product is Great!
customer_reviews.text: ECOS is a great product if you have sensitive skin or skin issues. It is made from all natural ingredients which is great for allergies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, you do not require a big amount of it for a full load and the clothes end up washed and smelling good. The only down side is the results provided on grease, but most laundry products won’t do much against that grease
customer_reviews.author: Fercho

customer_reviews.title: Long time Ecos buyer
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Smells fresh and never irritates my skin or lungs. Will be buying these again. ECOS is my go to for laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent and smell
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Love the magnolia and lily scent. Stays a little bit longer on clothes after wash than the lavender which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki S70

customer_reviews.title: Kind Aliens
customer_reviews.text: All is great except fighting tough stains. If you lightly dirty clothes this is sufficient
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality non toxic soap. Have not had any issues with our aerobic system using this.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne s

customer_reviews.title: Leaking product in box
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but I'll continue buying it in store instead of Amazon. When we got the box it was soaked and both containers had loose caps and were leaking everywhere. It was a pain to clean up and not worth it to us.
customer_reviews.author: Coriander95

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: MY NEICE WITH CANCER WAS USING THIS DETERGENT. WHEN I CAME HOME FROM VISIT I COULD NOT FIND IN MY LOCAL GROCERY STORE - PURCHASED FROM AMAZON AND SO FAR I HAVE BEEN PLEASED.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLYN R. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and keeps the clothes nice and soft
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Soule

customer_reviews.title: Very good clothes washing soap.
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a really great product for using in my washing machine. Cleans clothes very well.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent works, it's efficient, and I like the subtle scent. Its packaged wonderfully and was delivered with care, no leaks at all. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Belissette

customer_reviews.title: Item description misleading.
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product (and also the product image) showed this was a 2-pk, but I only received one in my order box today. That's very misleading and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent, good for sensitive skin, great value
customer_reviews.text: I've long used this brand and scent and it's my favorite. The value for x2 bottles is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: E. Sheafe

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on clothes, towels, and linens.
customer_reviews.text: I like this detergent because it doesn’t have an over powering scent, additionally, I can use it to wash my beautiful granddaughter’s clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the smell. Not a huge fan of the product. Dont feel like it washes laundry that well. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LoveHealth_Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with leaks
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a good portion of the product gone due to both containers leaked all over in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Natural Beauty!
customer_reviews.text: Ecos never disappoints! Between the beautiful natural scent, no dyes and ingredients that I know and trust, I could not ask for more in our family detergent! Trust me, it is Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Colton & Misty

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for laundry
customer_reviews.text: Does indeed have built-in softener. The scent is nice and it's very gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Twin Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Great product but damaged
customer_reviews.text: I do love this product - the first time it was delivered I had no problem. Second time I delivered the product was leaking everywhere. Returns wanted me to repackage and return but I’m not going to return leaking items. It’s more trouble. I will use what’s left.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Detergent dripped inside box.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but the packaging was bad. The box was soaked with the detergent on the inside from the (2) bottles that I purchased. Each bottle dripped about 3" of the liquid detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Leak in bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Received the box. Well packaged but one bottle leaked. So needless to say. I feel I lost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this.
customer_reviews.text: No harsh chemicals, so I know my pups and family are safe!
customer_reviews.author: Gail F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this laundry detergent. The scent, cleaning job & & price are great!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Seltzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light scent for washing lightly soiled clothing
customer_reviews.text: Nice light scent and is good for cleaning lightly soiled clothing. I typically combine this w/ a powdered unscented detergent to increase the strength. Unfortunately, not sure if it's the combo, but the scent doesnt really come out in clothing once washed. Still, I'd rather no scent than too strong of one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent
customer_reviews.text: I love that this detergent will last a long time because it’s concentrated. I absolutely love the magnolia & Lilly scent!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: great scent and works for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: love this scent. it’s so fresh and flowery! i love that it is gentle enough to use on my 4 month old daughters clothes in addition to me and my husband’s. no need to buy pricey separate baby detergent! great value and price here!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hiemstra

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described and arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cleaning product. Not animal testing and eco friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Veganizeit

customer_reviews.title: Arrived 1/3rd empty as leaked through screw top.
customer_reviews.text: You can imagine the mess inside. Though the package looks well protected by significant cardboard, the seal of the screw top did not hold. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Kutz-Marks

customer_reviews.title: My favorite detergent!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this detergent. Gets the clothes clean and leaves a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product and packaging are excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Packaging is excellent. I have on autoship.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Mom

product_meta.title: Earth Friendly Products ECOS 2X Liquid Laundry Detergent, Magnolia & Lily, 200 Loads, 100 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Color:Magnolia & Lily | Size:100 Fl Oz (Pack of 2) | Style:100 Loads Size: (Pack of 2) | Hypoallergenic ECOS Laundry Detergent lifts stains, brightens whites and guards colors with plant power that's safer for people, pets and the planet. Plus, it has a built-in fabric softener to save you money! Delightfully scented, it works beautifully in all water temperatures. Great for high-efficiency (HE) and standard machines. Ideal for hand-washing and gentle enough for delicate fabrics. ECOS Laundry Detergent is kind to the environment—it’s readily biodegradable and septic and greywater-safe. ECOS products are never tested on animals and contain no animal ingredients (they’re Leaping Bunny certified!). * 2X ultra concentrated detergent is tough on dirt yet kind to clothes * Made in USA without dyes, optical brighteners, parabens, phosphates or phthalates * Dermatologist-tested hypoallergenic; pH-balanced * Built-in fabric softener reduces static cling & saves money * Made with plant-powered ingredients & Magnolia & Lily essential oil * U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified for safety and effectiveness Family owned and operated since 1967, ECOS Products is the maker of ECOS Laundry Detergent and over 200 other friendly cleaners. We're a team of mothers, fathers, chemists and pioneers who believe passionately that everyone should have access to safer, effective and affordable cleaners. We've been breaking barriers in green science for 50 years, shattering the misconception that buying “green” has to be expensive. ECOS products are made in the USA using thoughtfully sourced global ingredients and powered by 100% renewable energy. We’re leading the industry with facilities that are carbon neutral, water neutral and Zero Waste Platinum certified, and we’re committed to helping you create a healthy home while protecting our planet’s precious resources. Gluten free.
feature_bullets: 2X ultra concentrated detergent is tough on dirt yet kind to clothes
Made in USA without dyes, optical brighteners, parabens, phosphates or phthalates
Built-in fabric softener reduces static cling & saves money
Made with plant-powered ingredients & Magnolia & Lily essential oil

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
